monster.name: Pseudodragon
senses: the pseudodragon has advantage on wisdom (perception) checks that rely on sight
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak them

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Dweomer Attuned
entries: Spells of 3rd level or below with a duration of at least 1 minute that target only the pseudodragon instead have a duration of Until Dispelled.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls {@condition unconscious} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

trait.name: Blood Scent
entries: The drake can pinpoint, by scent, the location of any creature within 120 ft. that does not have all of its hit points.

trait.name: Dweomer Chill
entries: A creature that casts a spell within 15 feet of the drake takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage per level of the spell. A creature that starts its turn in the area while concentrating on a spell must make a Concentration check.

entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

trait.name: Godlike Resistance
entries: If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead. If she does, she regains two fewer legendary action on her followihng turn.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Titanic Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to Tiamat may spend 30 feet of movement to attempt a {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto tiamat. While climbing on Tiamat, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against her, and she can make no more than one bite attack against that creature each turn.

trait.name: Multitrack Machinations
entries: Tiamat may concentrate on up to five spells simultaneously. She regains one fewer legendary action at the beginning of her turn for each spell she is concentrating on beyond the first. If she fails a concentration check, she loses concentration on all spells she is concentrating on.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tiamat can use her Maddening Presence. She then makes five attacks: four with her bite and one with her tail. She may replace all of her bite attacks with a use of her worry ability.

action.name: Pargaon Breath
entries: Tiamat exhales elemental energy in a 300-foot cone, or 300 foot long, 15 foot wide line (Tiamat's choice). Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity or Constitution saving throw (Tiamat's choice), taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The damage type is either Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison (Tiamat's choice).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}. While a head grapples a target, the head can attack only that target.

action.name: Tail

Each creature within 20 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take half as much damage, be pushed back 10 feet and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by at least two of Tiamat's heads must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitution throw or take 110 ({@damage 20d10}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success. A creature makes this save at disadvantage if it is {@condition grappled} by three or more of Tiamat's heads. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is ripped in half and dies.

action.name: Maddening Presence
entries: Each creature of Tiamat's choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a DC: 26 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns, and must use its turn to either dash away or attempt to hide. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: Tiamat makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: Tiamat beats her wings. Each creature within 30 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Tiamat can then fly up to half its flying speed

legendary.name: Breath Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat uses her Paragon Breath ability.

legendary.name: Wish (9th level spell, Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Tiamat casts any spell of 8th level or below.

entries: Om draken misslyckas med ett räddningskast kan den välja att lyckas istället.

trait.name: Shadow Form
entries: The shadow dragon's traits change depending on lighting.
In darkness, the dragon treats all creatures as unarmored (an unarmored creature's AC is usually 10 plus its Dexterity modifier.)
In dim light or darkness it can hide as a bonus action without obscurement, submerging itself in pools of shadow.
In bright light, attacks against the dragon have advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. If the dragon is bright light, it may replace its tail attack with two claw attacks.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Shadow Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales writhing shadow in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 105 ({@damage 30d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature with a shadow reduced to 0 by this damage falls into its shadow, and its shadow climbs into the material plane to replace it, with the following attributes:
The creature's shadow has the same statistics and abilities as the creature and has one hit point. It acts on the dragon's initiative and is under the dragon's control.
The creature remains conscious, but may only target its shadow with spells and abilities.
A creature can wrestle the shadow back into the shadow realm with a successful {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check. If it does, the creature returns to the material plane with one hit point.
If the creature's shadow receives any healing, the shadow is banished to the shadow realm. The creature returns to the material plane with one hit point.
If the creature's shadow dies, the creature is lost forever to the realm of shadow.

legendary.name: Snatch
entries: The dragon makes a claw attack against a creature that it is hidden from. If the attack hits, the target is {@condition grappled}, {@condition stunned}, and hidden from its allies until the begining of its next turn. This attack does not automatically reveal the dragon's position.

legendary.name: Shadow Tether
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the dragon can see must make a {@dc 22} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the next time the dragon takes damage in the next minute, it takes half as much damage and the target takes the same amount.

entries: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 22}) as its shadow lunges to grip it. A creature is freed if it is in bright light.

reaction.name: Shadow Glide (Dim light only)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage of a type it is resistant to, the dragon may teleport up to 20 feet and turn {@condition invisible} until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Illusory Passage
entries: The dragon can move through natural and magical foliage as though it were illusory.

trait.name: Capricious Jest
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the dragon and attempts to move must first make a {@dc 21} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the dragon controls its movement this turn.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The dragon has an illusory double that mirrors its movements imperfectly, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn and the next attack against the dragon before the dragon's next turn has advantage.

trait.name: Gargantuan Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the dragon may spend its full movement to attempt a {@dc 21} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the dragon. While climbing on the dragon, a creature is unaffected by its displacement trait.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Om draken misslyckas med ett räddningskast kan den välja att lyckas istället.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 21}), and pulled up to 20 feet towards the dragon.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 300 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Derealization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an shimmering aurora of existential crises in a 300 ft. cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw, taking 98 ({@damage 28d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more becomes convinced that it is an illusion. An affected creature cannot concentrate on spells, loses concentration if it was holding it, and makes a {@dc 24} Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that targets itself with an attack or spell immediately ends this effect.

action.name: Depersonalization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 300 ft. cone must make a {@dc 24} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the controlling player exchanges control of the creature with another player until the end of the dragon's next turn. At the beginning of an affected creatures turn, start a timer. The creature takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage for each 6 seconds the player takes to resolve its turn.

reaction.name: Out of Nowhere
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack while its Displacement is active, the dragon makes a tendril attack. If it hits, it may immediately us its Hurl ability as part of this reaction, and its Displacement trait is disabled until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 297 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Derealization Breath.

entries: The dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

A creature that targets itself with an attack or spell immediately ends this effect.

reaction.name: Hurl
entries: As a reaction to being damaged by a creature it has {@condition grappled}, the dragon throws a creature it has {@condition grappled} up to 30 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage, in addition to any damage from falling.

reaction.name: Slam
entries: As a reaction to a {@condition grappled} creature casting a spell, the dragon lifts the creature up and slams it into the ground, releasing the grapple. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage and be unable to stand this turn, or take half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Slink
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Capricious Jest
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the dragon and attempts to move must first make a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the dragon controls its movement this turn.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The dragon has an illusory double that mirrors its movements imperfectly, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes two attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Derealization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an shimmering aurora of existential crises in a 15 ft cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more becomes convinced that it is an illusion. An affected creature cannot concentrate on spells, loses concentration if it was holding it, and makes a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that targets itself with an attack or spell immediately ends this effect.

entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: Draken kan röra sig över och klättra på isiga ytor utan att behöva göra en förmågekontroll. Dessutom kostar svår terräng bestående av is eller snö den inte extra rörelse.

trait.name: Freezing Blood
entries: Whenever the silver dragon takes piercing or slashing damage, it raises its AC cumulatively by 1 until the beginning of its next turn, or until it takes at least 15 points of fire damage.

trait.name: Flattery Vulnerability
entries: When subjected to flattery by a medium or smaller creature, the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or behave as though {@condition charmed} by the creature until it takes hostile action against the dragon or its allies. A dragon that succeeds on this save becomes immune to flattery from that creature for the next minute.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Om draken misslyckas med ett räddningskast kan den välja att lyckas istället.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes four  attacks: one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 300 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 108 ({@damage 24d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The area becomes difficult terrain, and a creatue that starts its turn in it or enters the area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Hypothermic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of chilling gas. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition paralyzed} outside of its own turn, and repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more must use its action to doff its armor or shield.

reaction.name: Freeze Spell
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature cast a spell within 60 feet, the dragon chills the magic, preventing the spell from taking effect until the beginning of the spellcaster's next turn.

reaction.name: Raking Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the dragon makes a claw attack.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 251 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Freezing Breath.

legendary.name: Shield the Weak
entries: The dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. If it ends that movement within 15 feet of a friendly creature, the creature gains +5 to its AC and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or until it moves further away.

legendary.name: Face Me!
entries: One creature within 30 feet is compelled to meet the dragon in melee combat. On a failed save, the creature loses the attack or spell.

entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Outshine the Eager
entries: At initiative count 20, the dragon may force one creature within 60 ft. that it can see to make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the dragon trades initiatives with it.

trait.name: Jester's Fury
entries: Whenever one or more creatures within 60 ft. fail to laugh at a humorous comment or pun made by the dragon, it rolls to recharge its breath weapon.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Om draken misslyckas med ett räddningskast kan den välja att lyckas istället.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three  attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Acid Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor or a nonmagical metal shield, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}).

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Varje varelse av drakens val som befinner sig inom 120 fot från draken och som är medveten om den måste lyckas med ett {@dc 16} räddningsprov för visdom eller bli {@condition frightened} i 1 minut. En varelse kan upprepa räddningskastet i slutet av var och en av sina vändor, och avslutar effekten på sig själv vid en framgång. Om en varelses räddningskast lyckas eller om effekten upphör för den är varelsen immun mot drakens skräckinjagande närvaro de kommande 24 timmarna.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Aqua Regia Breath
entries: The dragon exhales acid in an 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage and losing 20% of the gold and platinum it is carrying on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Unattended gold and platinum in the area dissolves entirely.

action.name: Slowing Breath
entries: The dragon exhales gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

reaction.name: Heckler's Veto
entries: As a reaction to a creature it can see within 60 ft. casting a spell, the dragon forces the creature to make a {@dc 16} saving throw using the creature's spell casting ability. On a failed save, the spell fails.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 93 hit points, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

legendary.name: Banter
entries: The dragon offers a humorous comment or pun on an action a creature within 60 ft. took on its previous turn. The creature may use its reaction to reply with a humorous comment or salient pun of its own. If it does, both the creature and the dragon have advantage on the next attack or saving throw they make in the next minute. If it fails to do so, the creature has disadvantage on the next attack or saving throw it makes in the next minute.

legendary.name: False Wall
entries: The dragon raises an illusory wall of opaque stone, 20 ft. high and 20 ft. long, within 60 ft. A creature that attempts to pass through must succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw to do so. A creature that knows the wall is an illusion makes this save at advantage.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Outshine the Eager
entries: At initiative count 20, the dragon may force one creature within 60 ft. that it can see to make a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the dragon trades initiatives with it.

trait.name: Jester's Fury
entries: Whenever one or more creatures fail to laugh at a humorous comment or pun made by the dragon, it rolls to recharge its breath weapon.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three  attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Aqua Regia Breath
entries: The dragon exhales acid in an 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 ({@damage 9d8}) acid damage and losing 20% of the gold and platinum it is carrying on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Unattended gold and platinum in the area dissolves entirely.

action.name: Slowing Breath
entries: The dragon exhales gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

reaction.name: Banter
entries: As a reaction when a creature the dragon can see ends its turn within 60 ft. of it, the dragon offers a humorous comment or pun on an action the creature took this turn. The creature may use its reaction to reply with a humorous comment or salient pun of its own. If it does, both the creature and the dragon have advantage on the next attack or saving throw they make in the next minute. If it fails to do so, the creature has disadvantage on the next attack or saving throw it makes in the next minute.

trait.name: Outshine the Eager
entries: At initiative count 20, the dragon may force one creature within 60 ft. that it can see to make a {@dc 11} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the dragon trades initiatives with it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Aqua Regia Breath
entries: The dragon exhales acid in an 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage and losing 20% of the gold and platinum it is carrying on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Unattended gold and platinum in the area dissolves entirely.

action.name: Slowing Breath
entries: The dragon exhales gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

variant.name: Note: Aqua Regia
entries: Aqua regia is a mix of hydrochloric acid and nitric acid that is notable for its ability to dissolve gold and platinum, while leaving silver intact. Real aqua regia does dissolve copper, but I think it's much more on-theme for a copper dragon to keep all its copper and silver in a big, easilly plunderable pile, while its gold and platinum is kept dissolved in massive pools of fuming acid. If you've got a chemist in your group who's a stickler for that kind of thing, just call it Alkahest Breath instead.

variant.name: Recovering the Treasure
entries: A creature proficient in alchemy tools may use them to attempt a {@dc 15} ability check over the course of a work day, precipitating {@dice 2d10} x 100gp worth of gold dust out of the acid on a success. A creature may attempt this check any number of times, though the total amount of gold recovered in this way is limited by the amount originally disolved in the acid. A creature that fails this check by 5 or more exhausts their supply of reagents and must acquire a new kit to attempt it again.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Om draken misslyckas med ett räddningskast kan den välja att lyckas istället.

trait.name: Burning Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 ft. of the dragon takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: You Haven't Heard the Best Part
entries: A creature {@condition frightened} by the dragon cannot move further away from it while it is telling a story.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Draken kan använda sin skräckinjagande närvaro. Den gör sedan tre attacker: en med sitt bett och två med sina klor.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}) and {@condition restrained}. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath of Lingering Flames {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in an 300-foot line that is 15 feet wide and persists until the end of its next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in that line, or enters it for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 66 ({@damage 19d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a successful save.

action.name: Breath of Deepening Sleep {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} and gain 31 ({@dice 9d6}) temporary hit points, or 66 ({@dice 19d6}) temporary hit points if it failed the save by 5 or more. This effect ends for a creature if it loses any non-temporary hit points.

reaction.name: I Wasn't Finished!
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the dragon with an attack or harmful spell while the dragon is telling a story, the dragon ends the story and uses one of its breath weapons, if available.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 329 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

legendary.name: This Reminds Me... (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon begins telling a story that lasts until the end of its next turn. While the dragon is telling a story, it cannot use its breath weapons, and a creature that can hear the dragon and attempts to target the dragon with an attack or harmful spell must first make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
The dragon can continue the story as a bonus action on each of its turns, extending the duration until the end of its following turn.

legendary.name: Calm The Unruly
entries: The dragon shoots a wilting glare at one creature within 30 ft, ending one condition affecting it. The condition can be {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, Hasted, Polymorphed, or Raging.

legendary.name: Tail Sweep
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Burrowing Retreat
entries: The dragon moves up to half its burrow speed. If burrowing in sand, each creature within 15 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the dragon's turn.

action.name: Ice Tomb Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of ice in a 300-foot cone that clings to living creatures, sapping their vitality. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a creature gains 45 ({@dice 10d8}) temporary HP. As long as it has this temporary HP, the creature is {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, and has vulnerability to fire damage. A creature that starts its turn with any of this temporary HP must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend three hit dice. If it cannot, it drops to 0 HP.

reaction.name: Sudden Pounce
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 120 feet of the dragon ending its turn further away than it started, the dragon moves up to its speed toward the creature without provoking attacks of opportunity and makes a claw attack.

reaction.name: Freezing Blood
entries: As a reaction to taking 30 or more damage from a single source, the dragon adds 3 to its AC until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 262 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Freezing Breath.

legendary.name: Raise Hackles
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or lose any immunity it has to the dragon's Frightful Presence or the {@condition frightened} condition.

legendary.name: Terrorize
entries: One {@condition frightened} creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage. On the creature's next turn, it must use its movement to run away from the dragon.

legendary.name: Uttercold
entries: Draken tar till sina djupaste reserver. Fram till slutet av nästa vändning ignorerar kallskador som draken orsakar skaderesistens och draken förlorar en av sina legendariska motståndskrafter.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: Draken kan röra sig över och klättra på isiga ytor utan att behöva göra en förmågekontroll. Dessutom kostar svår terräng bestående av is eller snö den inte extra rörelse.

trait.name: Sluggish Chill
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be unable to make more than a single attack on its turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Om draken misslyckas med ett räddningskast kan den välja att lyckas istället.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Draken kan använda sin skräckinjagande närvaro. Den gör sedan fyra attacker: en med sitt bett, två med sina klor och en med sin svans. Den kan inte göra sina bett- och svansattacker mot samma mål.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19})

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} för att träffa, når 15 fot, ett mål. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8})) blåslagningsskada och målet skjuts 15 fot bort från draken.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Varje varelse av drakens val som befinner sig inom 120 fot från draken och som är medveten om den måste lyckas med ett {@dc 16} räddningsprov för visdom eller bli {@condition frightened} i 1 minut. En varelse kan upprepa räddningskastet i slutet av var och en av sina vändor, och avslutar effekten på sig själv vid en framgång. Om en varelses räddningskast lyckas eller om effekten upphör för den är varelsen immun mot drakens skräckinjagande närvaro de kommande 24 timmarna.

action.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, taking 72 ({@damage 16d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The area becomes difficult terrain, and a creatue that starts its turn in it or enters the area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ice Tomb Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Draken andas ut en isstöt i en 90 fot lång kon som klamrar sig fast vid levande varelser och tar deras livskraft. Varje varelse i området måste göra ett {@dc 22} räddningskast i styrka. Vid ett misslyckande får en varelse 45 ({@dice 10d8}) tillfälliga HP. Så länge den har dessa tillfälliga HP är varelsen {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded} och har sårbarhet för brandskador. En varelse som börjar sin tur med någon av dessa tillfälliga HP måste lyckas med ett {@dc 16} Konstitutionsbesparingskast eller tvingas använda två träfftärningar. Om den inte lyckas sjunker den till 0 HP.

reaction.name: Sudden Pounce
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 80 feet of the dragon ending its turn further away than it started, the dragon moves up to its speed toward the creature without provoking attacks of opportunity and makes a claw attack.

reaction.name: Freezing Blood
entries: As a reaction to taking 20 or more damage from a single source, the dragon adds 2 to its AC until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 183 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Freezing Breath.

legendary.name: Raise Hackles
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or lose any immunity it has to the dragon's Frightful Presence or the {@condition frightened} condition.

legendary.name: Terrorize
entries: En {@condition frightened} varelse inom 30 fot måste lyckas med ett {@dc 16} räddningskast för visdom eller ta 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psykisk skada. På varelsens nästa tur måste den använda sin rörelse för att springa bort från draken.

legendary.name: Uttercold
entries: Draken tar till sina djupaste reserver. Fram till slutet av nästa vändning ignorerar kallskador som draken orsakar skaderesistens och draken förlorar en av sina legendariska motståndskrafter.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 105 ({@damage 30d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. reaction.name: Discharge
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the dragon may force the spell's caster to take {@damage 1d10} damage per level of the spell.

reaction.name: Sandstorm
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the dragon may force the attacker to make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the dragon's next turn.

reaction.name: Gather Charge
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 76 HP, the dragon moves up to its walk or burrow speed. If it is hit with an attack in the course of this movement, it may immediately roll to recharge one of its breath weapons. It may move through creations of magical force with this movement, destroying them.

trait.name: Building Charge
entries: When the dragon rolls to recharge its lightning breath, creatures within 10 feet of it take {@damage 1d6} lightning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Discharge
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the dragon may force the spell's caster to take {@damage 1d10} damage per level of the spell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Om draken misslyckas med ett räddningskast kan den välja att lyckas istället.

trait.name: Sensitivity Aura
entries: Attacker mot varelser som inte är motståndskraftiga mot syra eller har immunitet mot syra inom 15 fot från draken får en kritisk träff vid ett kast på 18, 19 eller 20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three  attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It may replace one claw attack with a tail attack.

action.name: Acid Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage. If the target is wearing metal armor or a metal shield, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}) and {@condition restrained}. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage. On a critical hit, the target has vulnerability to the next source of acid damage it receives in the next minute.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Pool Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a gout of acid that spills over the ground in a 300-foot cone, fouling it until the end of the dragon's next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in the affected area or enters it for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or take 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Flesh Melting Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 300-foot line that is 15 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 80 ({@damage 18d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more suffers deformities, and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws, and attacks based on Strength or Dexterity.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 269 hit points, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

reaction.name: Cruel Jest
entries: As a reaction when a creature attempts to leave the dragon's reach, the dragon may force it to make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or be dragged 15 feet back towards the dragon. If the creature fails this save by 5 or more, this ability does not use the dragon's reaction.

legendary.name: Swipe
entries: The dragon makes a claw attack against a flying creature in range. If the attack hits, the creature is knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Mire
entries: The dragon disturbs the earth around it. A creature that is not flying and ends its movement within 10 feet of the dragon begins to sink into the earth, and must make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on dexterity saves, has a -2 penalty to its AC, and can't make more than a single attack in a turn. These effects last until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Varje varelse av drakens val som befinner sig inom 120 fot från draken och som är medveten om den måste lyckas med ett {@dc 19} räddningsprov för visdom eller bli {@condition frightened} i 1 minut. Om en varelses räddningskast lyckas eller om effekten upphör för den är varelsen immun mot drakens skräckinjagande närvaro de kommande 24 timmarna.

action.name: Flesh Melting Breath {@recharge 5}

En varelse som misslyckas med detta räddningsförsök med 5 eller mer drabbas av missbildningar och har nackdel vid förmågekontroller, räddningskast och attacker baserade på styrka eller smidighet.

trait.name: Opportunistic Feeder
entries: The Tyrannosaur's attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 when targeting a {@condition stunned} creature.

trait.name: Primal Undeath
entries: When the tyrannosaurus is reduced to zero hit points, it does not die. Instead, it immediately disgorges all remaining zombies and falls {@condition prone}, and a section of its skull shears off, revealing its brain. The tyrannosaurus' brain is a Tiny object with AC 20 and 10 hit points. If its brain is destroyed, the tyrannosaurus dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target. It may replace its bite with a use of its Thunderous Roar.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Thunderous Roar {@recharge 5}
entries: The tyrannosaurus emits a thunderous roar in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the Tyrannosaur's next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also {@condition stunned} until the end of the Tyrannosaur's next turn.

reaction.name: Thrash
entries: As a reaction to a creature trying and failing to escape its grapple, the Tyrannosaur may thrash its head about. The {@condition grappled} creature must make a {@dc 17} Constitution Saving Throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the tyrannosaurus' next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is instead {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the tyrannosaurus' next turn.

reaction.name: Disgorge Zombie
entries: As a reaction to taking damage or failing a save against a spell or magical effect, the tyrannosaurus disgorges a normal zombie, which appears in an unoccupied space within 10 ft. and acts on initiative count 0. The tyrannosaur typically contains 10 zombies when encountered.

trait.name: Opportunistic Feeder
entries: The Tyrannosaur's attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 when targeting a {@condition stunned} creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target. It may replace its bite with a use of its Thunderous Roar.

action.name: Tail

A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is instead {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the tyrannosaurus' next turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Grasslands Hunter
entries: The velociraptor can attempt to Hide as a bonus action in dense foliage.

action.name: Ripping Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is knocked {@condition prone} if it is Medium or smaller.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. This attack scores a critical on a 19 or 20 against a {@condition prone} creature.

trait.name: Booming Crest
entries: The hadrosaur can communicate simple ideas such as "Danger" or "Food" to each creature within 5 miles that understands it, using low-frequency sounds produced in its crest.

trait.name: Bird Hipped
entries: At the beginning of its turn, the Hadrosaur may rear up on two legs until the end of its turn. If it does, it can dash as a bonus acton this turn, and cannot use its multiattack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hadrosaur makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Scute Armor
entries: Creatures cannot benefit from flanking the ankylosaurus unless it is {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankylosaurus makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its tail club. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Tail Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 5d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, the target is pushed 10 feet away, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. A Large or larger creature that fails this save by 5 or more is unable to stand until it completes a short or long rest.

reaction.name: Flatten
entries: As a reaction to taking 10 or more damage from a single source, the ankylosaurus presses its body to the ground, protecting its soft underbelly. Until the beginning of its next turn, the Anklyosaurus adds 3 to its AC.

monster.name: Tomb Tapper Hulkdriver
languages: understands Common and Undercommon but can't speak

trait.name: Petrified Death
entries: A tomb tapper reduced to 0 hit points turns into a lifeless stone statue. Obects it is wearing or carrying are not transformed.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The tomb tapper can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: If the tomb tapper takes any thunder damage, it is {@condition deafened} until the end of its next turn. While {@condition deafened}, the tomb tapper is also {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Magic Sense
entries: The tomb tapper knows the precise location of each source of magic within 240 ft. of it.

trait.name: Hulk Driver
entries: While not {@condition incapacitated}, the tomb tapper telepathically controls each umber hulk within 60 ft. At the beginning of each of the tomb tapper's turns, each umber hulk within 60 ft. may use its reaction to move up to its burrow speed.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the tomb tapper may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 19} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the tomb tapper. While climbing on the tomb tapper, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the tomb tapper, and the tomb tapper has disadvantage on melee attacks against it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tomb tapper makes two melee attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its stoneshock hammer drive.

action.name: Arenite Sledgehammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) force damage and the creature is pushed 5 feet away. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage on a failed save. As a bonus action, the tomb tapper can return the hammer to its hand.

action.name: Sweeping Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and the creature is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). A creature that attempts to cast a spell while {@condition grappled} in this way must succeed on a {@dc 19} saving throw using its spellcasting modifier or have its spell fail.

action.name: Swallow Whole
entries: One Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the tomb tapper must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 66 ({@damage 12d10}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is swallowed whole. A creature with proficiency in Perception can see and target the swallowed creature with ranged abilities. As an action, a creature can pry the tomb tapper's mouth open with a successful {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check.

action.name: Stoneshock Hammer Drive {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant throws its hammer. Each creature in a 10 foot wide, 120 ft. long line must suceed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 39 ({@damage 6d12}) bludgeoning damage, be knocked {@condition prone}, and be pushed 10 feet away, or take half as much damage on a success. Walls of Wood or Stone up to 10 ft. thick in the area are destroyed.

reaction.name: Hunt Magic
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 15 ft. casting a spell, using a psionic ability, or activating a magic item, the tomb tapper makes a melee attack against it.

reaction.name: Telepathic Shriek (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 119 hit points, the tomb tapper lets out a telepathic shriek. Each creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and lose concentration, if it was holding it. Each umber hulk in the area is freed from the tomb tapper's control until the end of its following turn.

monster.name: Tomb Tapper
languages: understands Common and Undercommon but can't speak

entries: The tomb tapper can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: If the tomb tapper takes any thunder damage, it is {@condition deafened} until the end of its next turn. While {@condition deafened}, the tomb tapper is also {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Magic Sense
entries: The tomb tapper knows the precise location of each source of magic within 240 ft. of it.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the tomb tapper may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the tomb tapper. While climbing on the tomb tapper, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the tomb tapper, and the tomb tapper has disadvantage on melee attacks against it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tomb tapper makes two melee attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its stoneshock hammer drive.

action.name: Arenite Sledgehammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) force damage and the creature is pushed 5 feet away. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage on a failed save. As a bonus action, the tomb tapper can return the hammer to its hand.

action.name: Sweeping Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the creature is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). A creature that attempts to cast a spell while {@condition grappled} in this way must succeed on a {@dc 18} saving throw using its spellcasting modifier or have its spell fail.

action.name: Swallow Whole
entries: One Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the tomb tapper must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 66 ({@damage 12d10}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is swallowed whole. A creature with proficiency in Perception can see and target the swallowed creature with ranged abilities. As an action, a creature can pry the tomb tapper's mouth open with a successful {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check.

action.name: Stoneshock Hammer Drive {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant throws its hammer. Each creature in a 10 foot wide, 120 ft. long line must suceed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 32 ({@damage 5d12}) bludgeoning damage, be knocked {@condition prone}, and be pushed 10 feet away, or take half as much damage on a success. Walls of Wood or Stone up to 10 ft. thick in the area are destroyed.

reaction.name: Hunt Magic
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 15 ft. casting a spell, using a psionic ability, or activating a magic item, the tomb tapper makes a melee attack against it.

monster.name: Shield Guardian
languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak

trait.name: Bound
entries: The shield guardian is magically bound to an amulet. As long as the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (rounded up) is transferred to the guardian.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guardian makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. The target must then make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage and be pushed 10 ft. away.

action.name: Protective Wall
entries: The shield guardian can fold into a whirling wall of grinding metal, comprised of three contiguous 10 ft x 10 ft x 1 ft segments. Creatures in the wall's space when it appears must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) slashing damage and be pushed to a side of the guardian's choice. The shield guardian cannot move or take actions while in this form except to resume its normal form as a bonus action.

action.name: Death Ward
entries: One creature within 5 feet of the shield guardian is granted a measure of protection from death. The first time in the next minute that the creature would drop to 0 hit points, it instead drops to 1 hit point.

reaction.name: Interpose
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 5 feet targeting the wearer of the guardian's amulet with an attack, the guardian may impose disadvantage on the roll.

monster.name: Questing Scarecrow
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the scarecrow remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary, inanimate scarecrow.

trait.name: Dread Shamble
entries: The scarecrow may dash as a bonus action if at least one creature is afraid of it.

trait.name: Moved by Ill Intent
entries: If the scarecrow's creator dies, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or die as well. On a success, the scarecrow gains self-awareness.

trait.name: Volatile Spores
entries: If the scarecrow is killed by fire damage, it explodes. Each creature within 20 feet must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Relentless Tracker
entries: The scarecrow knows the distance to and direction of the creature whose clothes it wears as long as it is on the same plane of existence.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scarecrow makes two claw attacks and uses its paralyzing glare.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is {@condition frightened}, it takes an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Paralyzing Glare
entries: The scarecrow targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the scarecrow, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition frightened} until the end of the scarecrow's next turn. The {@condition frightened} target is {@condition paralyzed}.

monster.name: Scarecrow Haunter
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the scarecrow remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary, inanimate scarecrow.

trait.name: Dread Shamble
entries: The scarecrow may dash as a bonus action if at least one creature is afraid of it.

trait.name: Moved by Ill Intent
entries: If the scarecrow's creator dies, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or die as well. On a success, the scarecrow gains self-awareness.

trait.name: Volatile Spores
entries: If the scarecrow is killed by fire damage, it explodes. Each creature within 20 feet must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scarecrow makes two claw attacks and uses its horrid glare.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is {@condition frightened}, it takes an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Horrid Glare
entries: The scarecrow targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the scarecrow, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition frightened} for the next minute. While {@condition frightened}, the creature has its movement speed halved, and must use its action to dash away from the scarecrow by the safest available route. A creature may repeat this save at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success.

monster.name: Scarecrow Shambler
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the scarecrow remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary, inanimate scarecrow.

trait.name: Dread Shamble
entries: The scarecrow may dash as a bonus action if at least one creature is afraid of it.

trait.name: Moved by Ill Intent
entries: If the scarecrow's creator dies, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or die as well. On a success, the scarecrow gains self-awareness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scarecrow makes two claw attacks, one of which it may replace with its terrifying glare.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) slashing damage. If the target is {@condition frightened}, it takes an additional {@damage 2d4} psychic damage.

action.name: Terrifying Glare
entries: The scarecrow targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the scarecrow, the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition frightened} until the end of the scarecrow's next turn. While {@condition frightened}, the creature has its movement speed halved, and must use its action to dash away from the scarecrow by the safest available route.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The retriever can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Faultless Tracker
entries: The retriever is given a quarry by its master. The quarry can be a specific creature or object the master is personally acquainted with, or it can be a general type of creature or object the master has seen before. The retriever knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The retriever can have only one such quarry at a time. The retriever also always knows the location of its master.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The retriever has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The retriever makes two foreleg attacks, each of which it may replace with a use of its belekinetic beam.

action.name: Rending Forelegs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is wearing nonmagical armor, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 is destroyed.

action.name: Telekinetic Beam
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) force damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be dragged 30 ft. toward the retriever.

action.name: Force Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: The retriever emits a beam of transdimensional force in an 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 77 ({@damage 14d10}) force damage, or half as much on a successful save. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Plane Shift (7th level spell, Recharges on a Short or Long Rest
entries: The retriever and up to four {@condition unconscious} or {@condition incapacitated} creatures on its back teleport to a location on this or another plane of existance. An unwilling creature makes a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw, and is not teleported away on a success.

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The retriever restrains an {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone} target with steel netting (escape {@dc 18}). If the target is Large or smaller, the retreiver may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action. The netting can be attacked and destroyed (AC 18; HP 10; immunity to poison and psychic damage)

reaction.name: Scuttle
entries: As a reaction to being forced to make a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the retriever moves up to half its speed. If this movement puts the retriver out of range or area of the spell or magical effect, the retriever is unaffected.

reaction.name: Bloodied Beam (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 144 hit points, the retriever immediately recharges and uses its force beam.

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The quadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the quadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

trait.name: Clockwork Repetition
entries: The quadrone may choose to treat any {@dice d20} roll as a 10, instead of rolling.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pentadrone makes five arm attacks.

action.name: Arm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Paralysis Gas {@recharge 5}
entries: The pentadrone exhales a 30-foot cone of gas. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The quadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the quadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

trait.name: Clockwork Repetition
entries: The quadrone may choose to treat any {@dice d20} roll as a 10, instead of rolling.

trait.name: Perfect Synchrony
entries: If the quadrone is within 30 feet of a pentadrone, it uses the pentadrone's attack bonus instead of its own.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quadrone makes two fist attacks or four shortbow attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 80/320 fot, ett mål. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) genomträngande skada.

variant.name: Variant: Upgrade (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to seeing a pentadrone within 30 feet die, the quadrone may become a pentadrone. No more than one quadrone may take this reaction.

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The tridrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the tridrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

trait.name: Clockwork Repetition
entries: The tridrone may choose to treat any {@dice d20} roll as a 10, instead of rolling.

trait.name: Perfect Synchrony
entries: If the tridrone is within 30 feet of a quadrone, it uses the quadrone's attack bonus instead of its own. If the quadrone is using a pentadrone's attack bonus, the tridrone uses that instead, and so on.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tridrone makes three javelin attacks.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

variant.name: Variant: Upgrade (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to seeing a quadrone within 30 feet die, the tridrone may become a quadrone. No more than one tridrone may take this reaction.

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The duodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the duodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

trait.name: Clockwork Repetition
entries: The duodrone may choose to treat any {@dice d20} roll as a 10, instead of rolling.

trait.name: Perfect Synchrony
entries: If the duodrone is within 30 feet of a tridrone, it uses the tridrone's attack bonus instead of its own. If the tridrone is using a quadrone's attack bonus, the duodrone uses that instead, and so on.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The duodrone makes two javelin attacks.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.

variant.name: Variant: Upgrade (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to seeing a tridrone within 30 feet die, the duodrone may become a tridrone. No more than one duodrone may take this reaction.

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the monodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

trait.name: Clockwork Repetition
entries: The monodrone may choose to treat any {@dice d20} roll as a 10, instead of rolling.

trait.name: Perfect Synchrony
entries: If the monodrone is within 30 feet of a duodrone, it uses the duodrone's attack bonus instead of its own. If the duodrone is using a tridrone's attack bonus, the monodrone uses that instead, and so on.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) piercing damage.

variant.name: Variant: Upgrade (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to seeing a duodrone within 30 feet die, the monodrone may become a duodrone. No more than one monodrone may take this reaction.

trait.name: Dimensional Lock
entries: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the zelekhut. Any attempt to do so is wasted. The zelekhut's own abilities are not subject to this trait.

trait.name: Unyielding Form
entries: The zelekhut is immune to any effect that would inapacitate it, immobilize it, or alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The zelekhut has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Lawkeeper's Awareness
entries: The zelekhut knows what laws a creature it can see has broken.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zelekhut makes two chain attacks and uses its Subduing Shock.

action.name: Spiked Chains
entries: {@atk mw} automatic hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}55 ({@damage 10d10}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 24}). The zelekhut has two chains, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Subduing Shock
entries: Each creature {@condition grappled} by the zelekhut must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or take 108 ({@damage 24d8}) lightning damage. This damage can't reduce the target's hit points below 1.

action.name: Curse of Inevitable Justice
entries: One creature the marut can see within 120 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw or be cursed with a mark of judgement, suffering the following effects:
Any creature that can see the cursed creature knows what laws it has broken.
If this curse is removed, another zelekhut is summoned in an unoccupied space within 60 ft.

action.name: Justify
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the zelekhut and affected by its Curse of Inevitable Justice must succeed on a 20 Charisma saving throw or be teleported to a teleportation circle in the Hall of Concordance in Sigil. A target fails automatically if it has 1 or fewer hit points. If the target is teleported in this way, the zelekhut teleports with it to the circle.

action.name: Plane Shift (7th level spell)
entries: The zelekhut and up to eight willing creatures within 10 feet teleport to another plane of existence.

trait.name: Dimensional Lock
entries: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the marut. Any attempt to do so is wasted.

trait.name: Unyielding Form
entries: The marut is immune to any effect that would inapacitate it, immobilize it, or alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The marut has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Implacable Tracker
entries: The marut knows the distance to and direction of each creature that has exceeded its natural lifespan, even if the creature and the revenant are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by the marut dies, the marut knows.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marut makes three slam attacks, one of which it may replace with its Curse of Inevitable Death, if available.

action.name: Unerring Slam
entries: {@atk mw} automatic hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}60 force damage and the target is pushed up to 5 feet away. A creature that has legendary resistances loses one.

action.name: Curse of Inevitable Death
entries: One creature the marut can see within 120 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw or be cursed to die, suffering the following effects:
If a cursed creature is restored to life, it dies.
If a cursed creature gains a new body, the new body is destroyed.
If this curse is removed, another marut is summoned in an unoccupied space within 60 ft.

action.name: Plane Shift (7th level spell)
entries: The Marut and up to eight willing creatures within 10 feet teleport to another plane of existence.

monster.name: Homunculus
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

trait.name: Unobtrusive
entries: The homunculus may attempt to hide as a bonus action when adjacent to two or more creatures that are one size larger than it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.
